SEARCH
Package ep

Class Population

java.lang.Object
pa.AEmpire
ep.Population
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPopulation, IEmpire
public class Population extends AEmpire implements IPopulation
The Population class extends the AEmpire class and implements the IPopulation interface. It manages a population of individuals in the simulation.
